knob.name: QuietBoot
knob.description: [Enabled] - Display the logo screen during POST. [Disabled] - Display the diagnostic screen during POST.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: OnboardNICEnable_0
knob.description: Enable/Disable Onboard Network Controller.
knob.depex: Sif( OnboardNICHidden_0 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( SyscfgSysinfoHiddenFlag _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 OR ( BootMode _EQU_ 0 AND PCHNIC _EQU_ 1 ) )

knob.name: OnboardNICPortEnable_0
knob.description: Enable/Disable Onboard NIC?1? Port?1?.
knob.depex: Sif( OnboardNICHidden_0 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( Type _NEQ_ 4 AND Type _NEQ_ 0x17 AND Type _NEQ_ 0x16 ) _AND_ Sif( OnboardNICEnable_0 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( PCHNIC _EQU_ 1 AND BootMode _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( SyscfgSysinfoHiddenFlag _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( OnboardNICPortHidden_0 _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: OnboardNICPortEnable_1
knob.description: Enable/Disable Onboard NIC?1? Port?2?.
knob.depex: Sif( OnboardNICHidden_0 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( Type _NEQ_ 4 AND Type _NEQ_ 0x17 AND Type _NEQ_ 0x16 ) _AND_ Sif( OnboardNICEnable_0 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( PCHNIC _EQU_ 1 AND BootMode _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( SyscfgSysinfoHiddenFlag _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( OnboardNICPortHidden_1 _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: OnboardNICPortEnable_2
knob.description: Enable/Disable Onboard NIC?1? Port?3?.
knob.depex: Sif( OnboardNICHidden_0 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( Type _NEQ_ 4 AND Type _NEQ_ 0x17 AND Type _NEQ_ 0x16 ) _AND_ Sif( OnboardNICEnable_0 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( PCHNIC _EQU_ 1 AND BootMode _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( SyscfgSysinfoHiddenFlag _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( OnboardNICPortHidden_2 _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: OnboardNICPortEnable_3
knob.description: Enable/Disable Onboard NIC?1? Port?4?.
knob.depex: Sif( OnboardNICHidden_0 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( Type _NEQ_ 4 AND Type _NEQ_ 0x17 AND Type _NEQ_ 0x16 ) _AND_ Sif( OnboardNICEnable_0 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( PCHNIC _EQU_ 1 AND BootMode _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( SyscfgSysinfoHiddenFlag _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( OnboardNICPortHidden_3 _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: OnboardNICPortEnable_0_inst_2
knob.description: Enable/Disable Onboard NIC?1? Port?1?.
knob.depex: Sif( OnboardNICHidden_0 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( Type _NEQ_ 5 AND Type _NEQ_ 0x12 AND Type _NEQ_ 0x1D AND Type _NEQ_ 0x16 ) _AND_ Sif( OnboardNICEnable_0 _EQU_ 0 OR PCHNIC _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( SyscfgSysinfoHiddenFlag _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( OnboardNICPortHidden_0 _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: OnboardNICPortEnable_1_inst_2
knob.description: Enable/Disable Onboard NIC?1? Port?2?.
knob.depex: Sif( OnboardNICHidden_0 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( Type _NEQ_ 5 AND Type _NEQ_ 0x12 AND Type _NEQ_ 0x1D AND Type _NEQ_ 0x16 ) _AND_ Sif( OnboardNICEnable_0 _EQU_ 0 OR PCHNIC _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( SyscfgSysinfoHiddenFlag _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( OnboardNICPortHidden_1 _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: OnboardNICPortEnable_2_inst_2
knob.description: Enable/Disable Onboard NIC?1? Port?3?.
knob.depex: Sif( OnboardNICHidden_0 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( Type _NEQ_ 5 AND Type _NEQ_ 0x12 AND Type _NEQ_ 0x1D AND Type _NEQ_ 0x16 ) _AND_ Sif( OnboardNICEnable_0 _EQU_ 0 OR PCHNIC _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( SyscfgSysinfoHiddenFlag _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( OnboardNICPortHidden_2 _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: OnboardNICPortEnable_3_inst_2
knob.description: Enable/Disable Onboard NIC?1? Port?4?.
knob.depex: Sif( OnboardNICHidden_0 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( Type _NEQ_ 5 AND Type _NEQ_ 0x12 AND Type _NEQ_ 0x1D AND Type _NEQ_ 0x16 ) _AND_ Sif( OnboardNICEnable_0 _EQU_ 0 OR PCHNIC _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( SyscfgSysinfoHiddenFlag _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( OnboardNICPortHidden_3 _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: OnboardNICEnable_1
knob.description: Enable/Disable Onboard Network Controller.
knob.depex: Sif( SyscfgSysinfoHiddenFlag _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( OnboardNICHidden_1 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( NIC2_InfiniBand_Hidden _EQU_ 0 )

knob.name: OnboardNICPortEnable_4
knob.description: Enable/Disable Onboard NIC?2? Port?1?.
knob.depex: Sif( SyscfgSysinfoHiddenFlag _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( OnboardNICHidden_1 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( OnboardNICEnable_1 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( OnboardNICPortHidden_4 _EQU_ 1 OR NIC2_InfiniBand_Hidden _EQU_ 0 )

knob.name: OnboardNICPortEnable_5
knob.description: Enable/Disable Onboard NIC?2? Port?2?.
knob.depex: Sif( SyscfgSysinfoHiddenFlag _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( OnboardNICHidden_1 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( OnboardNICEnable_1 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( OnboardNICPortHidden_5 _EQU_ 1 OR NIC2_InfiniBand_Hidden _EQU_ 0 )

knob.name: OnboardNICPortEnable_6
knob.description: Enable/Disable Onboard NIC?2? Port?3?.
knob.depex: Sif( SyscfgSysinfoHiddenFlag _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( OnboardNICHidden_1 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( OnboardNICEnable_1 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( OnboardNICPortHidden_6 _EQU_ 1 OR NIC2_InfiniBand_Hidden _EQU_ 0 )

knob.name: OnboardNICPortEnable_7
knob.description: Enable/Disable Onboard NIC?2? Port?4?.
knob.depex: Sif( SyscfgSysinfoHiddenFlag _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( OnboardNICHidden_1 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( OnboardNICEnable_1 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( OnboardNICPortHidden_7 _EQU_ 1 OR NIC2_InfiniBand_Hidden _EQU_ 0 )

knob.name: IB1_PXE
knob.description: Enable/Disable InfiniBand Controller Option ROM and FlexBoot
knob.depex: Sif( NIC2_InfiniBand_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: OnboardNICIOMPortPXEEnable_8
knob.description: Enable/Disable Onboard/IOM NIC Port PXE Boot
knob.depex: Sif( OnboardNICHidden_2 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( ( FCoEEnabled _EQU_ 1 AND FCoE_Hidden _EQU_ 0 AND NIC10GbeCapbility_2 _EQU_ 1 ) OR ( OnBNICiSCSI _EQU_ 1 AND iSCSI10Gb_Hidden _EQU_ 0 ) ) _AND_ Gif( ( NIC10GbeCapbility_2 _EQU_ 1 AND PXE10GEnabled _EQU_ 0 ) OR ( NIC10GbeCapbility_2 _EQU_ 0 AND PXE1GEnabled _EQU_ 0 ) ) _AND_ Sif( OnboardNICPortHidden_8 _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: OnboardNICIOMPortPXEEnable_9
knob.description: Enable/Disable Onboard/IOM NIC Port PXE Boot
knob.depex: Sif( OnboardNICHidden_2 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( ( FCoEEnabled _EQU_ 1 AND FCoE_Hidden _EQU_ 0 AND NIC10GbeCapbility_2 _EQU_ 1 ) OR ( OnBNICiSCSI _EQU_ 1 AND iSCSI10Gb_Hidden _EQU_ 0 ) ) _AND_ Gif( ( NIC10GbeCapbility_2 _EQU_ 1 AND PXE10GEnabled _EQU_ 0 ) OR ( NIC10GbeCapbility_2 _EQU_ 0 AND PXE1GEnabled _EQU_ 0 ) ) _AND_ Sif( OnboardNICPortHidden_9 _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: OnboardNICIOMPortPXEEnable_10
knob.description: Enable/Disable Onboard/IOM NIC Port PXE Boot
knob.depex: Sif( OnboardNICHidden_2 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( ( FCoEEnabled _EQU_ 1 AND FCoE_Hidden _EQU_ 0 AND NIC10GbeCapbility_2 _EQU_ 1 ) OR ( OnBNICiSCSI _EQU_ 1 AND iSCSI10Gb_Hidden _EQU_ 0 ) ) _AND_ Gif( ( NIC10GbeCapbility_2 _EQU_ 1 AND PXE10GEnabled _EQU_ 0 ) OR ( NIC10GbeCapbility_2 _EQU_ 0 AND PXE1GEnabled _EQU_ 0 ) ) _AND_ Sif( OnboardNICPortHidden_10 _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: OnboardNICIOMPortPXEEnable_11
knob.description: Enable/Disable Onboard/IOM NIC Port PXE Boot
knob.depex: Sif( OnboardNICHidden_2 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( ( FCoEEnabled _EQU_ 1 AND FCoE_Hidden _EQU_ 0 AND NIC10GbeCapbility_2 _EQU_ 1 ) OR ( OnBNICiSCSI _EQU_ 1 AND iSCSI10Gb_Hidden _EQU_ 0 ) ) _AND_ Gif( ( NIC10GbeCapbility_2 _EQU_ 1 AND PXE10GEnabled _EQU_ 0 ) OR ( NIC10GbeCapbility_2 _EQU_ 0 AND PXE1GEnabled _EQU_ 0 ) ) _AND_ Sif( OnboardNICPortHidden_11 _EQU_ 1 )

knob.depex: Sif( NIC3_InfiniBand_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: OnboardNICIOMPortPXEEnable_14
knob.description: Enable/Disable Onboard/IOM NIC Port PXE Boot
knob.depex: Sif( OnboardNICHidden_3 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( ( FCoEEnabled _EQU_ 1 AND FCoE_Hidden _EQU_ 0 AND NIC10GbeCapbility_3 _EQU_ 1 ) OR ( OnBNICiSCSI _EQU_ 1 AND iSCSI10Gb_Hidden _EQU_ 0 ) ) _AND_ Gif( ( NIC10GbeCapbility_3 _EQU_ 1 AND PXE10GEnabled _EQU_ 0 ) OR ( NIC10GbeCapbility_3 _EQU_ 0 AND PXE1GEnabled _EQU_ 0 ) ) _AND_ Sif( OnboardNICPortHidden_14 _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: Pci64BitResourceAllocation
knob.description: Enable or disable memory mapped I/O of 64-bit PCI devices to 4 GB or greater address space.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/PCI Configuration/Memory Mapped I/O above 4 GB

knob.name: MmiohBase
knob.description: Select MMIO High Base
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Pci64BitResourceAllocation _EQU_ 0 )

knob.name: MmiohSize
knob.description: Sets the Size of MMIO space above 4GB.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Pci64BitResourceAllocation _EQU_ 0 )

knob.name: AddinVideoAdapter
knob.description: When Onboard Video is Enabled, and Add-in Video Adapter is also Enabled, both can be active. The onboard video is still the primary console and active during BIOS POST; the add-in video adapter would be active under an OS environment with the video driver support. When Onboard Video is Enabled, and Add-in Video Adapter is Disabled, then only the onboard video would be active. When Onboard Video is Disabled, and Add-in Video Adapter is Enabled, then only the add-in video adapter would be active.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 OR VideoExistFlag _EQU_ 0x01 OR LegacyVgaSocket _EQU_ 0x02 OR LegacyVgaSocket _EQU_ 0x01 AND VideoExistFlag _EQU_ 0x04 OR LegacyVgaSocket _EQU_ 0x01 AND VideoExistFlag _EQU_ 0x05 )

knob.name: OnboardVideo
knob.description: Enable or disable onboard video controller. Warning: System video is completely disabled if this option is disabled and an add-in video adapter is not installed.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 OR VideoExistFlag _EQU_ 0x01 OR LegacyVgaSocket _EQU_ 0x02 )

knob.name: FastVideo
knob.description: Enable/disable fast video. Fast video allows the screen light up in early phase. Note:Fast Video only appears when Onboard Video is Enabled.
knob.depex: Sif( OnboardVideo _EQU_ 0x02 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: LegacyVgaSocket
knob.description: Determines whether Legacy VGA video output is enabled for PCIe slots attached to Processor Socket 1 or 2. Socket 1 is the default.
knob.depex: Sif( LegacyVgaSocket_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 OR VideoExistFlag _EQU_ 0x01 OR VideoExistFlag _EQU_ 0x02 OR VideoExistFlag _EQU_ 0x03 )

knob.name: ARIEnable
knob.description: Enable or disable the ARI support.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: SRIOVEnable
knob.description: Enable or disable the SR-IOV support.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: UEFINetworkStack
knob.description: Enable or Disable the whole UEFI Network Stack.
knob.depex: Sif( BootMode _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/PCI Configuration/UEFI Network Stack/UEFI Network Stack

knob.name: IPv4PXESupport
knob.description: Enable or Disable IPv4 PXE Support in the UEFI Network Stack.
knob.depex: Sif( BootMode _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( UEFINetworkStack _EQU_ 0x01 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/PCI Configuration/UEFI Network Stack/IPv4 PXE Support

knob.name: IPv6PXESupport
knob.description: Enable or Disable IPv6 PXE Support in the UEFI Network Stack.
knob.depex: Sif( BootMode _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( UEFINetworkStack _EQU_ 0x01 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/PCI Configuration/UEFI Network Stack/IPv6 PXE Support

knob.name: SerialA
knob.description: Enable or Disable Serial port A.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: SerialAIo
knob.description: Select Serial port A base I/O address.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( SerialA _EQU_ 0 )

knob.name: SerialB
knob.description: Enable or Disable Serial port B.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( SerialB_Hidden _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: SerialBIo
knob.description: Select Serial port B base I/O address. This field will not appear when Serial B port enable/disable does not appear.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( SerialB_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( SerialB _EQU_ 0 )

knob.name: QpiLinkSpeed
knob.description: Allows for selecting the Intel(R) UltraPath Interconnect Frequency. Recommended to leave in [Auto Max] so that the BIOS can select the highest common Intel(R) UltraPath Interconnect frequency.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( NumCpus _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: XptPrefetchEn
knob.description: XPT Prefetch
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( CPUStepping _LT_ 0x09 )

knob.name: KtiPrefetchEn
knob.description: Enable or disable KTI prefetch
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: StaleAtoSOptEn
knob.description: Stale A to S Dir optimization.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: LLCDeadLineAlloc
knob.description: Enable - opportunistically fill dead lines in LLC. Disable - never fill dead lines in LLC.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: DfxD2cEn
knob.description: Direct To Core (D2C)
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: DfxD2kEn
knob.description: Direct To UPI (D2K)
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )

knob.depex: Sif( IIOFormSet_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( Type _EQU_ 0x16 ) _AND_ Sif( IIO1Present _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_30 _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Integrated IO Configuration/NTB PCIe Port 3a on CPU socket 2

knob.name: NtbBarSizeOverride_5
knob.description: If disabled, the BIOS will not program NTB BAR size registers.
knob.depex: Sif( IIOFormSet_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( Type _EQU_ 0x16 ) _AND_ Sif( IIO1Present _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_30 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( NtbPpd_5 _EQU_ 0 )

knob.name: NtbSplitBar_5
knob.description: If Enabled, will use two 32 bit BARs instead of 64 bit BAR.
knob.depex: Sif( IIOFormSet_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( Type _EQU_ 0x16 ) _AND_ Sif( IIO1Present _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_30 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( NtbPpd_5 _EQU_ 0 OR NtbBarSizeOverride_5 _EQU_ 0 )

knob.name: NtbBarSizePBar23_5
knob.description: Used to set the prefetchable BAR 23 size on primary side of NTB. Value ? than 12 or ? 29 (39 for BIOS supporting ? 4G PCI) disables BAR.
knob.depex: Sif( IIOFormSet_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( Type _EQU_ 0x16 ) _AND_ Sif( IIO1Present _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_30 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( NtbPpd_5 _EQU_ 0 OR NtbBarSizeOverride_5 _EQU_ 0 )

knob.name: NtbBarSizePBar4_5
knob.description: Used to set the prefetchable BAR 4 size on primary side of NTB. Value ? than 12 or ? 29 (39 for BIOS supporting ? 4G PCI) disables BAR.
knob.depex: Sif( IIOFormSet_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( Type _EQU_ 0x16 ) _AND_ Sif( IIO1Present _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_30 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( NtbPpd_5 _EQU_ 0 OR NtbBarSizeOverride_5 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( NtbSplitBar_5 _EQU_ 0 )

knob.name: NtbBarSizePBar5_5
knob.description: Used to set the prefetchable BAR 5 size on primary side of NTB. Value ? than 12 or ? 29 (39 for BIOS supporting ? 4G PCI) disables BAR.
knob.depex: Sif( IIOFormSet_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( Type _EQU_ 0x16 ) _AND_ Sif( IIO1Present _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_30 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( NtbPpd_5 _EQU_ 0 OR NtbBarSizeOverride_5 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( NtbSplitBar_5 _EQU_ 0 )

knob.name: NtbBarSizePBar45_5
knob.description: Used to set the prefetchable BAR 45 size on primary side of NTB. Value ? than 12 or ? 29 (39 for BIOS supporting ? 4G PCI) disables BAR.
knob.depex: Sif( IIOFormSet_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( Type _EQU_ 0x16 ) _AND_ Sif( IIO1Present _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_30 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( NtbPpd_5 _EQU_ 0 OR NtbBarSizeOverride_5 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( NtbSplitBar_5 _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: NtbBarSizeSBar23_5
knob.description: Used to set the prefetchable BAR 23 size on secondary side of NTB. Value ? than 12 or ? 39 disables BAR.
knob.depex: Sif( IIOFormSet_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( Type _EQU_ 0x16 ) _AND_ Sif( IIO1Present _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_30 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( NtbPpd_5 _EQU_ 0 OR NtbBarSizeOverride_5 _EQU_ 0 )

knob.name: NtbBarSizeSBar4_5
knob.description: Used to set the prefetchable BAR 4 size on Secondary side of NTB. Value ? than 12 or ? 29 (39 for BIOS supporting ? 4G PCI) disables BAR.
knob.depex: Sif( IIOFormSet_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( Type _EQU_ 0x16 ) _AND_ Sif( IIO1Present _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_30 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( NtbPpd_5 _EQU_ 0 OR NtbBarSizeOverride_5 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( NtbSplitBar_5 _EQU_ 0 )

knob.name: NtbBarSizeSBar5_5
knob.description: Used to set the prefetchable BAR 5 size on Secondary side of NTB. Value ? than 12 or ? 29 (39 for BIOS supporting ? 4G PCI) disables BAR.
knob.depex: Sif( IIOFormSet_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( Type _EQU_ 0x16 ) _AND_ Sif( IIO1Present _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_30 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( NtbPpd_5 _EQU_ 0 OR NtbBarSizeOverride_5 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( NtbSplitBar_5 _EQU_ 0 )

knob.name: NtbBarSizeSBar45_5
knob.description: Used to set the prefetchable BAR 45 size on secondary side of NTB. Value ? than 12 or ? 39 disables BAR.
knob.depex: Sif( IIOFormSet_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( Type _EQU_ 0x16 ) _AND_ Sif( IIO1Present _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_30 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( NtbPpd_5 _EQU_ 0 OR NtbBarSizeOverride_5 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( NtbSplitBar_5 _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: NtbSBar01Prefetch_5
knob.description: Configures Secondary BAR 0/1 as Prefetchable/Non-Prefetchable.
knob.depex: Sif( IIOFormSet_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( Type _EQU_ 0x16 ) _AND_ Sif( IIO1Present _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_30 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( NtbPpd_5 _EQU_ 0 OR NtbPpd_5 _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: NtbXlinkCtlOverride_5
knob.description: Configure NTB port as DSD/USP, USD/DSP, or use external pins.
knob.depex: Sif( IIOFormSet_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( Type _EQU_ 0x16 ) _AND_ Sif( IIO1Present _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_30 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( NtbPpd_5 _EQU_ 0 OR NtbPpd_5 _EQU_ 2 )

knob.name: VTdSupport
knob.description: Enable/Disable Intel(R) Virtualization Technology for Directed I/O (Intel(R) VT-d). Report the I/O device assignment to VMM through DMAR ACPI Tables.
knob.depex: Sif( IIOFormSet_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Integrated IO Configuration/Intel(R) VT for Directed I/O

knob.name: AcsControl
knob.description: Enable: Programs ACS only to Chipset Pcie Root Ports Bridges; Disable: Programs ACS to all Pcie bridges.
knob.depex: Sif( IIOFormSet_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( VTdSupport _EQU_ 0x00 )

knob.name: CoherencySupport

knob.depex: Sif( IIOFormSet_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( VTdSupport _EQU_ 0x00 )

knob.name: PciePllSsc
knob.description: Pcie Pll SSC percentage or Disable SSC. Range is 0.0%-1.9%. Last one is the POR for LBG.
knob.depex: Sif( IIOFormSet_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: DFXEnable

knob.depex: Sif( IIOFormSet_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( Type _NEQ_ 0x1D )

knob.description: No Snoop Enable/Disable for each CB device

knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Integrated IO Configuration/No Snoop(Sck1 IOAT Function 7)

knob.name: Cpu1DMIPcieMaxPayload
knob.description: Configures DMI-PCIe Port Max Payload Size to 128B/256B/AUTO
knob.depex: Sif( IIOFormSet_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: DdrFreqLimit
knob.description: Force specific Memory Operating Speed or use Auto setting.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: ImcInterleaving
knob.description: Select IMC Interleaving setting.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( NumaEn _NEQ_ 1 )

knob.name: PagePolicy
knob.description: Select Page Policy.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: EnforcePOR
knob.description: Enable to enforce POR restrictions for DDR3 frequency and voltage programming
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( Type _NEQ_ 0x1B AND Type _NEQ_ 0x20 )

knob.name: dramrxeqEnable
knob.description: Enables DRAM RXEQ Training
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( Type _NEQ_ 0x1B AND Type _NEQ_ 0x20 )

knob.name: rxmodctleEnable
knob.description: Enables RX MOD CTLE Training
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( Type _NEQ_ 0x1B AND Type _NEQ_ 0x20 )

knob.name: AttemptFastBoot
knob.description: Enable - Portions of memory reference code will be skipped when possible to increase boot speed on warm boots. Disable - Disables this feature. Auto - Sets it to the MRC default setting; current default is Enabled.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: AttemptFastBootCold
knob.description: Enable - Portions of memory reference code will be skipped when possible to increase boot speed on cold boots. Disable - Disables this feature. Auto - Sets it to the MRC default setting; current default is Enabled.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: ADREn
knob.description: Enables the detecting and enabling of ADR.
knob.depex: Sif( NVMPresent _EQU_ 0 AND ADModePresent _EQU_ 0 )

knob.name: eraseArmNVDIMMS
knob.description: Enables/Disables Erasing and Arming NVDIMMs.
knob.depex: Sif( NVMPresent _EQU_ 0 )

knob.name: restoreNVDIMMS
knob.description: Enables/Disables Automatic restoring of NVDIMMs.
knob.depex: Sif( NVMPresent _EQU_ 0 )

knob.name: interNVDIMMS
knob.description: Controls if NVDIMMs are interleaved together or not.
knob.depex: Sif( NVMPresent _EQU_ 0 )

knob.name: MirrorMode
knob.description: Allows the user to select the Mirror Mode to be applied for the next boot. 2LM will be hidden when DCPMM is not present.
knob.depex: Sif( MemRasForm_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( MirrorModeSupport _EQU_ 0 OR ADDDCEn _EQU_ 1 OR RankSparing _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Memory Configuration/Memory RAS and Performance Configuration/Mirror mode

knob.name: ADDDCEn
knob.description: Enable/Disable Adaptive Double Device Data Correction Sparing.
knob.depex: Sif( MemRasForm_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( X8DIMMPresent _EQU_ 1 OR MirrorMode _EQU_ 1 OR RankSparing _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Memory Configuration/Memory RAS and Performance Configuration/ADDDC Sparing

knob.name: RankSparing
knob.description: Enable/Disable Memory Rank Sparing.
knob.depex: Sif( MemRasForm_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( SpareModeSupport _EQU_ 0 OR ADDDCEn _EQU_ 1 OR MirrorMode _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Memory Configuration/Memory RAS and Performance Configuration/Memory Sparing

knob.name: Nvar1_multiSparingRanks
knob.description: The Rank number used when Rank Sparing is enabled.
knob.depex: Sif( MemRasForm_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( SpareModeSupport _EQU_ 0 OR ADDDCEn _EQU_ 1 OR MirrorMode _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( RankSparing _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Memory Configuration/Memory RAS and Performance Configuration/Multi-Rank Sparing

knob.name: EPSDRASMode
knob.description: Allows the user to select the memory RAS Configuration to be applied for the next boot.
knob.depex: Sif( MemRasForm_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( SklMemRas_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( MemRas_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( SyscfgSysinfoHiddenFlag _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Memory Configuration/Memory RAS and Performance Configuration/Select Memory RAS Configuration

knob.name: Nvar0_multiSparingRanks
knob.description: The Rank number used when Rank Sparing is enabled.
knob.depex: Sif( MemRasForm_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( SklMemRas_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( MemRas_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( EPSDRASMode _NEQ_ 4 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Memory Configuration/Memory RAS and Performance Configuration/Multi-Rank Sparing

knob.name: NumaEn
knob.description: If enabled, BIOS includes ACPI tables that are required for NUMA-aware Operating Systems.
knob.depex: Sif( MemRasForm_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( NumaCap _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( FPGAPresent _NEQ_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Memory Configuration/Memory RAS and Performance Configuration/NUMA Optimized

knob.name: SncEn
knob.description: When enabled, sub NUMA cluster enabled. If any memory controller has no memory attached, this feature cannot be enabled.
knob.depex: Sif( MemRasForm_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( NumaCap _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( NumaEn _EQU_ 0 OR ImcEnable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Memory Configuration/Memory RAS and Performance Configuration/Sub_NUMA Cluster

knob.name: PatrolScrub
knob.description: When enabled, performs periodic checks on memory cells and proactively walks through populated memory space, to seek and correct soft ECC errors.
knob.depex: Sif( MemRasForm_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Memory Configuration/Memory RAS and Performance Configuration/Patrol Scrub

knob.name: spareErrTh
knob.description: Threshold value for logging Correctable Errors(CE) - Threshold of 10(default) logs 10th CE,?All? logs every CE, and ?None? means no CE logging. All and None are not valid with Rank Sparing.
knob.depex: Sif( MemRasForm_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( EPSDRASMode _EQU_ 4 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Memory Configuration/Memory RAS and Performance Configuration/Correctable Error Threshold

knob.name: CorrMemErrEn
knob.description: Enable/Disable Memory Corrected Error.
knob.depex: Sif( MemRasForm_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( MemRas_Hidden _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Memory Configuration/Memory RAS and Performance Configuration/Memory Corrected Error

knob.name: CorrMemErrCmciEn
knob.description: If disabled, CMCI event appears when CE happens. If enabled, CMCI event is blocked when CE happens.
knob.depex: Sif( MemRasForm_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Memory Configuration/Memory RAS and Performance Configuration/Cloaking

knob.name: ProcessorPowerPolicy
knob.description: Allows the user to set an overall power and performance policy for the system, and when changed will modify a selected list of options to achieve the policy. These options are still changeable outside of the policy but do reflect the changes that the policy makes when a new policy is selected. [Performance] Optimization is strongly toward performance, even at the expense of energy efficiency. [Balanced Performance] Weights optimization toward performance, while conserving energy. [Balanced Power] Weights optimization toward energy conservation, with good performance. [Power] Optimization is strongly toward energy efficiency, even at the expense of performance.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Power n Performance/CPU Power and Performance Policy

knob.name: WorkLdConfig
knob.description: Controls the aggressiveness of the energy performance BIAS settings. This bit field allows BIOS to choose a configuration that may improve performance on certain workloads.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( ProcessorEistEnable _EQU_ 0 )

knob.name: UFSDisable
knob.description: Allows the voltage and frequency of Uncore to be programmed independently. The Uncore activity is monitored to optimize the frequency in real-time.
knob.depex: Sif( UncorePowerMgt_Hidden _EQU_ 1 OR ProcessorEistEnable _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( ProcessorEistEnable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Power n Performance/Uncore Power Management/Uncore Frequency Scaling

knob.name: PerfPLimitEn
knob.description: Allows the Uncore frequency coordination of two processors when enabled.
knob.depex: Sif( UncorePowerMgt_Hidden _EQU_ 1 OR ProcessorEistEnable _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Power n Performance/Uncore Power Management/Performance P-limit

knob.name: ProcessorEistEnable
knob.description: Enhanced Intel SpeedStep(R) Technology allows the system to dynamically adjust processor voltage and core frequency, which can result in decreased average power consumption and decreased average heat production. Contact your OS vendor regarding OS support of this feature.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Power n Performance/CPU P State Control/Enhanced Intel SpeedStep(R) Tech

knob.name: ConfigTDP
knob.description: Allows the user to disable/enable Intel Config TDP.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( ProcessorEistEnable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Power n Performance/CPU P State Control/Intel Configurable TDP

knob.name: ConfigTDPLevel
knob.description: Allows the user to select Intel Config TDP level - Nominal is the default TDP.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( ProcessorEistEnable _EQU_ 0 OR ConfigTDP _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Power n Performance/CPU P State Control/Configurable TDP Level

knob.name: TurboMode
knob.description: Intel(R) Turbo Boost Technology allows the processor to automatically increase its frequency if it is running below power, temperature, and current specifications.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( ProcessorEistEnable _EQU_ 0 OR TurboModeAvailable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Power n Performance/CPU P State Control/Intel(R) Turbo Boost Technology

knob.name: EETurboDisable
knob.description: When Energy Efficient Turbo is enabled, the CPU cores only enter the turbo frequency when the PCU detects high utilization.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( ProcessorEistEnable _EQU_ 0 OR TurboModeAvailable _EQU_ 0 OR TurboMode _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Power n Performance/CPU P State Control/Energy Efficient Turbo

knob.name: ProcessorHWPMEnable
knob.description: Disable: Hardware chooses a P-state based on OS Request (Legacy P-States) Native Mode:Hardware chooses a P-state based on OS guidance Out of Band Mode:Hardware autonomously chooses a P-state (no OS guidance).
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Power n Performance/Hardware P States/Hardware P-States

option.text: Native Mode with No Legacy Support

knob.name: ProcessorHWPMInterrupt
knob.description: Enable/Disable Hardware PM Interrupt.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( ProcessorHWPMEnable _NEQ_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Power n Performance/Hardware P States/HardwarePM Interrupt

knob.name: ProcessorEPPEnable
knob.description: When enabled, HW masks EPP in CPUID[6].10 and uses the Energy Performance Bias Register for Energy vs. Performance Preference input.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( ProcessorHWPMEnable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Power n Performance/Hardware P States/EPP Enable

knob.name: ProcessorAPSrocketing
knob.description: Enable/Disable the rocketing mechanism in the HWP p-state selection pcode algorithm. Rocketing enables the core ratio to jump to max turbo instantaneously as opposed to a smooth ramp up.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( ProcessorHWPMEnable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Power n Performance/Hardware P States/APS rocketing

knob.name: ProcessorScalability
knob.description: Enable/Disable the use of scalability in HWP pcode power efficiency algorithms. Scalability is the measure of estimated performance improvement for a given increase in core frequency.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( ProcessorHWPMEnable _EQU_ 0 )

knob.name: ProcessorRaplPrioritization
knob.description: RAPL Prioritization allows creating core groups of different priority
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( ProcessorHWPMEnable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Power n Performance/Hardware P States/RAPL Prioritization

knob.name: PackageCState
knob.description: Set and specifies the lowest C-state for Processor package. C0/C1 sate is no package C-state support. C6 retention state provides more power saving than C6 non retention state. No Limit is no package C-state limit.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Power n Performance/CPU C State Control/Package C-State

knob.name: ProcessorC1eEnable
knob.description: When Enabled, the CPU will switch to the Minimum Enhanced Intel SpeedStep(R) Technology operating point when all execution cores enter C1. Frequency will switch immediately, followed by gradual Voltage switching. When Disabled, the CPU will not transit to the minimum Enhanced Intel SpeedStep(R) Technology operating point when all cores enter C1.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Power n Performance/CPU C State Control/C1E

knob.name: C3Enable
knob.description: Enable/Disable Processor C3 (ACPI C2/C3) report to OS
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( C3Support _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Power n Performance/CPU C State Control/Processor C3

knob.name: C6Enable
knob.description: Enable/Disable Processor C6 (ACPI C3) report to OS.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Power n Performance/CPU C State Control/Processor C6

knob.name: ProcessorHyperThreadingDisable
knob.description: Intel(R) Hyper-Threading Technology allows multithreaded software applications to execute threads in parallel within each processor. Contact your OS vendor regarding OS support of this feature.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( HTAvailable _EQU_ 0 )

knob.name: ActiveCoreNum
knob.description: Number of cores to enable in each processor package.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( CpuCoresAvailabe _NEQ_ 28 )

knob.name: ActiveCoreNum_inst_2
knob.description: Number of cores to enable in each processor package.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( CpuCoresAvailabe _NEQ_ 26 )

knob.name: ActiveCoreNum_inst_3
knob.description: Number of cores to enable in each processor package.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( CpuCoresAvailabe _NEQ_ 24 )

knob.name: ActiveCoreNum_inst_4
knob.description: Number of cores to enable in each processor package.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( CpuCoresAvailabe _NEQ_ 22 )

knob.name: ActiveCoreNum_inst_5
knob.description: Number of cores to enable in each processor package.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( CpuCoresAvailabe _NEQ_ 20 )

knob.name: ActiveCoreNum_inst_6
knob.description: Number of cores to enable in each processor package.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( CpuCoresAvailabe _NEQ_ 18 )

knob.name: ActiveCoreNum_inst_7
knob.description: Number of cores to enable in each processor package.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( CpuCoresAvailabe _NEQ_ 16 )

knob.name: ActiveCoreNum_inst_8
knob.description: Number of cores to enable in each processor package.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( CpuCoresAvailabe _NEQ_ 14 )

knob.name: ActiveCoreNum_inst_9
knob.description: Number of cores to enable in each processor package.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( CpuCoresAvailabe _NEQ_ 12 )

knob.name: ActiveCoreNum_inst_10
knob.description: Number of cores to enable in each processor package.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( CpuCoresAvailabe _NEQ_ 10 )

knob.name: ActiveCoreNum_inst_11
knob.description: Number of cores to enable in each processor package.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( CpuCoresAvailabe _NEQ_ 8 )

knob.name: ActiveCoreNum_inst_12
knob.description: Number of cores to enable in each processor package.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( CpuCoresAvailabe _NEQ_ 6 )

knob.name: ActiveCoreNum_inst_13
knob.description: Number of cores to enable in each processor package.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( CpuCoresAvailabe _NEQ_ 4 )

knob.name: ProcessorVmxEnable
knob.description: Intel(R) Virtualization Technology allows a platform to run multiple operating systems and applications in independent partitions. Note: A change to this option requires the system to be powered off and then back on before the setting takes effect.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: ProcessorSmxEnable
knob.description: Enable/Disable Intel(R) Trusted Execution Technology. Takes effect after reboot.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( ProcessorSmxEnable_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( ( ( TpmEnable _EQU_ 0 OR TpmActivate _EQU_ 0 ) AND Tpm2Present _EQU_ 0 ) OR ProcessorVmxEnable _EQU_ 0 OR VTdSupport _EQU_ 0 )

knob.name: PoisonEn
knob.description: Enable Enhanced Error Containment Mode (Data Poisoning) - Erroneous data coming from memory will be poisoned. If disabled (default), will be in Legacy Mode - No data poisoning support available.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( NotSupportPoisonEn _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: MlcStreamerPrefetcherEnable
knob.description: MLC Streamer is a speculative prefetch unit within the processor(s). Note: Modifying this setting may affect performance.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: MlcSpatialPrefetcherEnable
knob.description: [Enabled] - Fetches adjacent cache line (128 bytes) when required data is not currently in cache. [Disabled] - Only fetches cache line with data required by the processor (64 bytes).
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: DCUStreamerPrefetcherEnable
knob.description: The next cache line will be prefetched into L1 data cache from L2 or system memory during unused cycles if it sees that the processor core has accessed several bytes sequentially in a cache line as data. [Disabled] - Only fetches cache line with data required by the processor (64 bytes).
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( DCUPrefetcher_Hidden _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: DCUIPPrefetcherEnable
knob.description: The next cache line will be prefetched into L1 instruction cache from L2 or system memory during unused cycles if it sees that the processor core has accessed several bytes sequentially in a cache line as data.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( DCUPrefetcher_Hidden _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: LlcPrefetchEnable
knob.description: Enable/Disable LLC Prefetch on all threads.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: RdtCatOpportunisticTuning
knob.description: Cache Allocation Technology mask tuning options. NOTE: If IOT is enabled on any socket this option will override to 0x003
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( IotEn _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: ThreeStrikeTimer
knob.description: The 3 strike counter can be turned off by writing into the MISC_FEATURE_CONTROL_DISABLE_THREE_STRIKE_CNT(MSR 0x01a4).
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: SataInterfaceMode
knob.description: - AHCI enables the Advanced Host Controller Interface, which provides Enhanced SATA functionality. - RAID Mode provides host based RAID support on the onboard SATA ports.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Mass Storage Controller Configuration/SATA Controller (Port 0 - 7)/AHCI Capable SATA Controller

knob.name: SataInterfaceRAIDMode
knob.description: - Intel(R) ESRT2 (Powered By LSI*): Supports RAID 0/1/10 and optional RAID 5 with Inte(R) RAID5 Upgrade Keys. Uses Intel(R) ESRT2 drivers (based on LSI* MegaSR). - Intel(R) RSTe: Provides pass-through drive support. Also provides host based RAID 0/1/10/5 support. Uses Intel(R) RSTe iastor drivers.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( BootMode _EQU_ 0 OR IsNSSku _EQU_ 1 OR IsNSSku _EQU_ 3 OR Type _EQU_ 0x1D OR Type _EQU_ 0x1B OR Type _EQU_ 0x20 ) _AND_ Sif( SataInterfaceMode _EQU_ 4 OR SataTestMode _EQU_ 1 OR SataInterfaceMode _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Mass Storage Controller Configuration/SATA Controller (Port 0 - 7)/SATA RAID Options

knob.name: SataSpinUpOption
knob.description: If enabled for the AHCI Capable SATA controller, Staggered Spin-Up will be performed on drives attached to it. Otherwise these drives will all spin up at boot.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( _LIST_ SataTestMode _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( SataInterfaceMode _EQU_ 4 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Mass Storage Controller Configuration/SATA Controller (Port 0 - 7)/SATA HDD Staggered Spin-Up

knob.name: sSataInterfaceMode
knob.description: - AHCI enables the Advanced Host Controller Interface, which provides Enhanced SATA functionality. - RAID Mode provides host based RAID support on the onboard SATA ports.
knob.depex: Sif( sSataCntr_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Mass Storage Controller Configuration/sSATA Controller (Port 0 - 5)/AHCI Capable sSATA Controller

knob.name: sSataSpinUpOption
knob.description: If enabled for the AHCI Capable sSATA controller, Staggered Spin-Up will be performed on drives attached to it. Otherwise these drives will all spin up at boot.
knob.depex: Sif( sSataCntr_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( _LIST_ SataTestMode _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( sSataInterfaceMode _EQU_ 4 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Mass Storage Controller Configuration/sSATA Controller (Port 0 - 5)/sSATA HDD Staggered Spin-Up

knob.name: FanSpdCtrlProfile
knob.description: [Performance] - Fan control provides primary system cooling before attempting to throttle memory. [Acoustic] - The system will favor using throttling of memory over boosting fans to cool the system if thermal thresholds are met.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/System Acoustic and Performance Configuration/Set Fan Profile

knob.name: FanSpeedOffset
knob.description: Valid Offset 0-100. This number is added to the calculated PWM value to increase Fan Speed.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( SyscfgSysinfoHiddenFlag _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( FanSpeedOffsetNotAvailable _EQU_ 0x01 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/System Acoustic and Performance Configuration/Fan PWM Offset

knob.name: AirFlowLimit
knob.description: System CFM Limit. BIOS valid range 60-100. This set the maximum allowable system CFM under normal operating conditions. This value will be ignored during error conditions such as a fan failure or a critical temperature event. The value in this item is percentage of max CFM. The resolution is 1%.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( SyscfgSysinfoHiddenFlag _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( AirFlowLimitNotAvailable _EQU_ 0x01 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/System Acoustic and Performance Configuration/Air Flow Limit

knob.name: ExitAirTemp
knob.description: Exit Air temperature. BIOS valid range 50-70. This is to give MAX exit air temperature to BMC.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( SyscfgSysinfoHiddenFlag _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( ExitAirTempNotAvailable _EQU_ 0x01 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/System Acoustic and Performance Configuration/Exit Air Temp

knob.name: FanUCC
knob.description: Max domain PWM. BIOS valid range 70-100. This set the absolute maximum fan PWM for the domain.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( SyscfgSysinfoHiddenFlag _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( FanUCCNotAvailable _EQU_ 0x01 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/System Acoustic and Performance Configuration/Fan UCC

knob.name: UsbLegacySupport
knob.description: Enables Legacy USB support. AUTO option disables legacy support if no USB devices are connected. Disable option will only keep USB Keyboard devices available for EFI applications.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( BootMode _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: UsbEmul6064
knob.description: Enables I/O port 60h/64h emulation support. This may be needed for legacy USB keyboard support when using an OS that is USB unaware.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( BootMode _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: UsbNonBoot
knob.description: Exclude USB in Boot Table. [Enabled] - This will remove all USB Mass Storage devices as Boot options. [Disabled] - This will allow all USB Mass Storage devices as Boot options.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( UsbLegacySupport _EQU_ 1 OR BootMode _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: UsbMassResetDelay
knob.description: USB Mass Storage device Start Unit command timeout. Setting to a larger value provides more time for a mass storage device to be ready, if needed.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: UsbEmu1
knob.description: [Auto] - USB devices less than 530 MB are emulated as floppies. [Forced FDD] - HDD formatted drive is emulated as an FDD (e.g., ZIP drive).
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( BootMode _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( UsbMassDevNum _EQU_ 0 OR UsbLegacySupport _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: UsbEmu2
knob.description: [Auto] - USB devices less than 530 MB are emulated as floppies. [Forced FDD] - HDD formatted drive is emulated as an FDD (e.g., ZIP drive).
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( BootMode _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( UsbMassDevNum _EQU_ 1 OR UsbMassDevNum _EQU_ 0 OR UsbLegacySupport _EQU_ 1 )

knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( BootMode _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( UsbMassDevNum _EQU_ 12 OR UsbMassDevNum _EQU_ 11 OR UsbMassDevNum _EQU_ 10 OR UsbMassDevNum _EQU_ 9 OR UsbMassDevNum _EQU_ 8 OR UsbMassDevNum _EQU_ 7 OR UsbMassDevNum _EQU_ 6 OR UsbMassDevNum _EQU_ 5 OR UsbMassDevNum _EQU_ 4 OR UsbMassDevNum _EQU_ 3 OR UsbMassDevNum _EQU_ 2 OR UsbMassDevNum _EQU_ 1 OR UsbMassDevNum _EQU_ 0 OR UsbLegacySupport _EQU_ 1 )

knob.description: [Auto] - USB devices less than 530 MB are emulated as floppies. [Forced FDD] - HDD formatted drive is emulated as an FDD (e.g., ZIP drive).
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( BootMode _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( UsbMassDevNum _EQU_ 14 OR UsbMassDevNum _EQU_ 13 OR UsbMassDevNum _EQU_ 12 OR UsbMassDevNum _EQU_ 11 OR UsbMassDevNum _EQU_ 10 OR UsbMassDevNum _EQU_ 9 OR UsbMassDevNum _EQU_ 8 OR UsbMassDevNum _EQU_ 7 OR UsbMassDevNum _EQU_ 6 OR UsbMassDevNum _EQU_ 5 OR UsbMassDevNum _EQU_ 4 OR UsbMassDevNum _EQU_ 3 OR UsbMassDevNum _EQU_ 2 OR UsbMassDevNum _EQU_ 1 OR UsbMassDevNum _EQU_ 0 OR UsbLegacySupport _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: OverclockingSupport
knob.description: Performance Menu for Processor and Memory.
knob.depex: Sif( Type _NEQ_ 0x1D ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: SvidEnable
knob.description: Enable/Disable SVID. Disabling SVID disables input voltage overrides. Uses Mailbox MSR 0x150, cmd 0x13.
knob.depex: Sif( Type _NEQ_ 0x1D ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( OverclockingSupport _EQU_ 0 )

knob.name: SvidVoltageOverride
knob.description: Overrides the Vccin input voltage. This controls the input voltage to the CPU and will affect all CPU domains. Uses Mailbox MSR 0x150, cmd 0x13. Range 0-2500 mV
knob.depex: Sif( Type _NEQ_ 0x1D ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( OverclockingSupport _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( SvidEnable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/HW Validation Test Only/SVID Voltage Override

knob.name: VDimmVddEnable
knob.description: Change memory VDD value
knob.depex: Sif( Type _NEQ_ 0x1D ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/HW Validation Test Only/Memory VDD Override

knob.name: VDimmVdd
knob.description: Change memory VDD value. For VR12 or VR13.5 1200 - 1.200V 1250 - 1.250V 1350 - 1.350V 1500 - 1.500V Each step is +-5mV
knob.depex: Sif( Type _NEQ_ 0x1D ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( VDimmVddEnable _EQU_ 0 )

knob.name: EnforcePOR_inst_2
knob.description: Enable to enforce POR restrictions for DDR3 frequency and voltage programming
knob.depex: Sif( Type _NEQ_ 0x1D ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: RankMargin
knob.description: Enables the rank margin tool to run after DDR3 memory training
knob.depex: Sif( Type _NEQ_ 0x1D ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/HW Validation Test Only/Rank Margin Tool

knob.name: rmtPatternLength
knob.description: Sets the pattern length for the Rank Margin Tool
knob.depex: Sif( Type _NEQ_ 0x1D ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/HW Validation Test Only/RMT Pattern Length

knob.name: MrcSerialDebug
knob.description: MRC debug message control
knob.depex: Sif( Type _NEQ_ 0x1D ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/HW Validation Test Only/MRC Serial Debug Message Level

knob.name: bdatEn
knob.description: Enable Disables BDAT
knob.depex: Sif( Type _NEQ_ 0x1D ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: EnableBiosSsaLoader
knob.description: Enables loading the BSSA test module
knob.depex: Sif( Type _NEQ_ 0x1D ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/HW Validation Test Only/BSSA Module Loader

knob.name: EnableBiosSsaRMT
knob.description: Enables the BSSA Rank Margin Tool
knob.depex: Sif( Type _NEQ_ 0x1D ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/HW Validation Test Only/BSSA Rank Margin Tool

knob.name: ScrambleEnDDRT
knob.description: Enables data scrambling for NVMDIMM
knob.depex: Sif( Type _NEQ_ 0x1D ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/HW Validation Test Only/Data Scrambling for NVMDIMM

knob.name: ScrambleEn
knob.description: Enables data scrambling for DDR4
knob.depex: Sif( Type _NEQ_ 0x1D ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/HW Validation Test Only/Data Scrambling for DDR4

knob.name: PcieGlobalAspm
knob.description: This option allows setting ASPM support for all downstream devices.
knob.depex: Sif( Type _NEQ_ 0x1D ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/HW Validation Test Only/PCI-E ASPM Support (Global)

knob.name: ASPML1Check
knob.description: Enanle ASPM L1 Check Mode
knob.depex: Sif( Type _NEQ_ 0x1D ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/HW Validation Test Only/ASPM L1 Check Mode

knob.name: PmaxSign
knob.description: Controls whether PMAX Config offset is a positive or negative value.
knob.depex: Sif( Type _NEQ_ 0x1D ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/HW Validation Test Only/PMAX Config Sign

knob.name: PmaxOffset
knob.description: Input decimal correction factor to program. Valid input values are 0 to 15. Will be positive or negative based on PMAX Config Sign value.
knob.depex: Sif( Type _NEQ_ 0x1D ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/HW Validation Test Only/PMAX Config Offset

knob.name: DirectoryModeEn
knob.description: Directory Mode Enable
knob.depex: Sif( Type _NEQ_ 0x1D ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/HW Validation Test Only/Directory Mode Enable

knob.name: Dwr_Enable
knob.description: Enables/disables Dirty Warm Reset. It promotes regular reset to DWR under internal error conditions.
knob.depex: Sif( Type _NEQ_ 0x1D ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/HW Validation Test Only/Dirty Warm Reset

knob.name: Dwr_Stall
knob.description: When enabled, system will enter spin loop during dirty warm reset allowing manual error collection
knob.depex: Sif( Type _NEQ_ 0x1D ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Dwr_Enable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/HW Validation Test Only/Dirty Warm Reset Stall

knob.name: Dwr_BmcRootPort
knob.description: RootPort that BMC is connected to
knob.depex: Sif( Type _NEQ_ 0x1D ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Dwr_Enable _EQU_ 0 )

knob.name: DwrEn_PMCGBL

knob.depex: Sif( Type _NEQ_ 0x1D ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Dwr_Enable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/HW Validation Test Only/ Host Reset Timeout

knob.name: DwrEn_MEWDT

knob.depex: Sif( Type _NEQ_ 0x1D ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Dwr_Enable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/HW Validation Test Only/ ME FW Watchdog Timer

knob.name: DwrEn_IEWDT

knob.depex: Sif( Type _NEQ_ 0x1D ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Dwr_Enable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/HW Validation Test Only/ IE FW Watchdog Timer

knob.name: Dwr_MeResetPrepDone
knob.description: ME Reset Prep Done (ETR3 bit 17)
knob.depex: Sif( Type _NEQ_ 0x1D ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Dwr_Enable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/HW Validation Test Only/ME Reset Prep Done

knob.name: Dwr_IeResetPrepDone
knob.description: IE Reset Prep Done (ETR3 bit 16)
knob.depex: Sif( Type _NEQ_ 0x1D ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Dwr_Enable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/HW Validation Test Only/IE Reset Prep Done

knob.name: IccSscOverride
knob.description: Set non-default ICC spreaad spectrum configuration.
knob.depex: Sif( Type _NEQ_ 0x1D ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/HW Validation Test Only/Override ICC Spread Spectrum Configuration

knob.name: IccSscMode_2
knob.description: Select spread spectrum mode.
knob.depex: Sif( Type _NEQ_ 0x1D ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( IccSscOverride _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/HW Validation Test Only/ SSC2 mode

knob.name: FPGASocketEnable_0
knob.description: Enable or disable FPGA on Socket 0
knob.depex: Sif( FPGAPresent _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: FPGABBS_0

knob.depex: Sif( FPGAPresent _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( FPGASocketEnable_0 _EQU_ 0 )

knob.name: FPGASocketEnable_1

knob.name: FPGABBS_1

knob.depex: Sif( FPGAPresent _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( FPGASocketEnable_1 _EQU_ 0 )

knob.name: IccSscOverride_inst_2
knob.description: Set non-default ICC spreaad spectrum configuration.
knob.SetupPgPtr: ???/Override ICC Spread Spectrum Configuration/Override ICC Spread Spectrum Configuration

knob.name: PowerOnPassword
knob.description: Enable Power On Password support. If enabled, password entry is required in order to boot the system.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( AdminName _EQU_ 0x0 )

knob.name: FrontPanelLockOut
knob.description: If enabled, locks the power button OFF function and the reset and NMI Diagnostic Interrupt buttons on the system?s front panel. If [Enabled] is selected, power-off and reset must be controlled via a system management interface, and the NMI Diagnostic Interrupt is not available.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: TpmOperation
knob.description: [No Operation] - No changes to current state. [Turn On] - Enables and activates TPM. [Turn Off] - Disables and deactivates TPM. [Clear Ownership] - Removes TPM ownership n returns TPM to factory default state. Note: Setting returns to [No Operation] on every boot.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( TpmPresent _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( TpmHide _EQU_ 0 )

knob.name: Tpm2Operation
knob.description: Select one of the supported operation to change TPM2 state.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( SyscfgSysinfoHiddenFlag _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( Tpm2Present _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( TpmHide _EQU_ 0 )

knob.name: TCG2ActivatePCRBank0
knob.description: TCG2 Request PCR Bank: SHA1
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( SyscfgSysinfoHiddenFlag _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( Tpm2Present _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( TpmHide _EQU_ 0 )

knob.name: TCG2ActivatePCRBank1
knob.description: TCG2 Request PCR Bank: SHA256
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( SyscfgSysinfoHiddenFlag _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( Tpm2Present _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( TpmHide _EQU_ 0 )

knob.name: Tpm2FwUpdateEnable
knob.description: Enable/disable Update TPM firmware.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( SyscfgSysinfoHiddenFlag _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( Tpm2Present _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( TpmHide _EQU_ 0 )

knob.name: PropagateSerr
knob.description: On SERR, generate an NMI and log an error. Note: [Enabled] must be selected for the Assert NMI on PERR setup option to be visible.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: PropagatePerr
knob.description: On PERR, generate an NMI and log an error. Note: This option is only active if the Assert NMI on SERR option has [Enabled] selected.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( PropagateSerr _EQU_ 0 )

knob.name: PcieAer
knob.description: [Enabled] - PCIe AER (Advanced Error Reporting) is enabled. [Disabled] - PCIe AER is disabled. All PCIe AER errors will be masked once PCIe AER is disabled.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: PCIECorrErrorEn
knob.description: [Enabled] - Processor n PCH PCIe correctable error logging is enabled. [Disabled] - Processor n PCH PCIe correctable error logging is disabled.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( PcieAer _EQU_ 0 )

knob.name: PcieCeErrThreshold
knob.description: Threshold value for logging Correctable Errors(CE) - Threshold of 20/10/5 logs 20th/10th/5th CE, ?0?(default) logs every CE.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: WheaSupport
knob.description: [Enabled] - WHEA (Windows Hardware Error Architecture) is enabled. [Disabled] - WHEA is disabled.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: ResetCaterr
knob.description: When enabled system gets reset upon encountering Catastrophic Error (CATERR); when disabled system does not get reset on CATERR.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: ResetErr2
knob.description: When enabled system gets reset upon encountering ERR2 (Fatal error); when disabled system does not get reset on ERR2.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: EnforcedPasswd
knob.description: Enables or Disables the Enforced Password support. Enabling it will allow the BIOS to send the Seed, Algorithm and password information to BMC.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( AdminName _EQU_ 0x00 )

knob.name: RandomPowerPolicy
knob.description: Allows a delay in powering up after a power failure, to reduce peak power requirements. The delay can be fixed or automatic between 60-300 seconds.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( SvrMngmntResumeAcPowerLoss _EQU_ 0 )

knob.name: RandomPowerOnDelayValue
knob.description: Fixed time period 60-300 seconds for Power Restore Delay.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( SvrMngmntResumeAcPowerLoss _EQU_ 0 OR RandomPowerPolicy _EQU_ 0 OR RandomPowerPolicy _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: SvrMngmntFrb2Enable
knob.description: Fault Resilient Boot (FRB). The BIOS programs the BMC watchdog timer for approximately 6 minutes. If the BIOS does not complete POST before the timer expires, the BMC will reset the system.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: OSBootWDTimer
knob.description: The BIOS programs the watchdog timer with the timeout value selected. If the OS does not complete booting before the timer expires, the BMC will reset the system and an error will be logged. Requires OS support or Intel Management Software Support.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: OSBootWDTimerPolicy
knob.description: If the OS watchdog timer is enabled, this is the system action taken if the watchdog timer expires. [Reset] - System performs a reset. [Power Off] - System powers off.
knob.depex: Gif( OSBootWDTimer _EQU_ 0 OR Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Server Management/OS Boot Watchdog Timer Policy

knob.name: OSBootWDTimerTimeout
knob.description: If the OS watchdog timer is enabled, this is the timeout value the BIOS will use to configure the watchdog timer.
knob.depex: Gif( OSBootWDTimer _EQU_ 0 OR Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Server Management/OS Boot Watchdog Timer Timeout

knob.name: SvrMngmntAcpiIpmi
knob.description: If enabled, the BMC will be detectable by OSes which support plug and play loading of an IPMI driver. Do not enable this option if your OS does not support this driver.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Server Management/Plug n Play BMC Detection

knob.name: SerialOverLanEnable_0
knob.description: Enable/disable Serial Over LAN feature for Baseboard Management Lan. [Advanced ? Serial Port Configuration ? Serial A Enable] needs be enabled before enabling this option.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Server Management/Console Redirection/SOL for Baseboard Mgmt

knob.name: SerialOverLanEnable_1
knob.description: Enable/disable Serial Over LAN feature for Baseboard Management Lan 2. [Advanced ? Serial Port Configuration ? Serial A Enable] needs be enabled before enabling this option.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( SOLBM2_Hidden _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Server Management/Console Redirection/SOL for Baseboard Mgmt2

knob.name: SerialOverLanEnable_2
knob.description: Enable/disable Serial Over LAN feature for Dedicated Mgmt NIC. [Advanced ? Serial Port Configuration ? Serial A Enable] needs be enabled before enabling this option.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Server Management/Console Redirection/SOL for Dedicated Mgmt NIC

knob.name: SvrMngmntConsRedirSerialEnable
knob.description: Console redirection allows a serial port to be used for server management tasks. [Disabled] - No console redirection. [Serial Port A/B] - Configure serial port A/B for console redirection. Enabling this option will disable display of the Quiet Boot logo screen during POST. [Advanced ? Serial Port Configuration ? Serial A/B Enable] needs be enabled before enabling this option.
knob.depex: Gif( SerialOverLanEnable_0 _EQU_ 1 OR SerialOverLanEnable_1 _EQU_ 1 OR SerialOverLanEnable_2 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 OR SerialA _EQU_ 0 AND SerialB _EQU_ 0 )

knob.name: SvrMngmntConsRedirSerial1FlowCtrl
knob.description: Flow control is the handshake protocol. This setting must match the remote terminal application. [None] - Configure for no flow control. [RTS/CTS] - Configure for hardware flow control.
knob.depex: Gif( SerialOverLanEnable_0 _EQU_ 1 OR SerialOverLanEnable_1 _EQU_ 1 OR SerialOverLanEnable_2 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: SvrMngmntConsRedirSerial1BitRate
knob.description: Serial port transmission speed. This setting must match the remote terminal application.
knob.depex: Gif( SerialOverLanEnable_0 _EQU_ 1 OR SerialOverLanEnable_1 _EQU_ 1 OR SerialOverLanEnable_2 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: SvrMngmntConsRedirSerial1ConnectionType
knob.description: Character formatting used for console redirection. This setting must match the remote terminal application.
knob.depex: Gif( SerialOverLanEnable_0 _EQU_ 1 OR SerialOverLanEnable_1 _EQU_ 1 OR SerialOverLanEnable_2 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: ContinueLOSRIntoDOS
knob.description: This option enables legacy OS redirection (i.e., DOS) on serial port. If it is enabled, the associated serial port is hidden from the legacy OS.
knob.depex: Gif( SerialOverLanEnable_0 _EQU_ 1 OR SerialOverLanEnable_1 _EQU_ 1 OR SerialOverLanEnable_2 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: TerminalResolution
knob.description: Remote Terminal Resolution.
knob.depex: Gif( SerialOverLanEnable_0 _EQU_ 1 OR SerialOverLanEnable_1 _EQU_ 1 OR SerialOverLanEnable_2 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: SvrMngmntDiagnosticMsgEnable
knob.description: [Enabled] -Display the diagnostic screen during POST. [Disabled] - Display the logo screen during POST.
knob.depex: Gif( SerialOverLanEnable_0 _EQU_ 1 OR SerialOverLanEnable_1 _EQU_ 1 OR SerialOverLanEnable_2 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( VariablePlatId _NEQ_ 0xFE OR SvrMngmntConsRedirSerialEnable _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: BootTimeout
knob.description: The number of seconds BIOS will pause at the end of POST to allow the user to press the [F2] key for entering the BIOS Setup utility. Valid values are 0-65535. 1 is the default. A value of 65535 causes the system to go to the Boot Manager menu and wait for user input for every system boot.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: EarlyBootTimeout
knob.description: The number of seconds the BIOS will pause before Option ROMs are dispatched.Valid values are 0-65535.Zero is the default.A value of 65535 causes the system to go to the Boot Manager menu and wait for user input for every system boot.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced Boot Options/Early System Boot Timeout

knob.name: BootMode
knob.description: When Boot Mode is Legacy, the BIOS only loads modules required for booting Legacy Operating Systems. When Boot Mode is UEFI, the BIOS only loads modules required for booting UEFI-aware Operating Systems.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( SecureBootEnableFlag _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( HideBootMode _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: UefiWindowsInt10Workaround
knob.description: If Video BIOS is Legacy, the BIOS uses the legacy video ROM instead of the EFI video ROM when Boot Mode is UEFI.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( SecureBootEnableFlag _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( BootMode _EQU_ 0 )

knob.name: BootOptionRetry
knob.description: If enabled, this continually retries non-EFI-based boot options without waiting for user input.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: UsbBootPriorityEnabled
knob.description: If enabled, newly discovered USB devices are moved to the top of their boot device category. If disabled, newly discovered USB devices are moved to the bottom of their boot device category.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: StaticBootPolicy
knob.description: [Disabled] - Devices removed from the system are deleted from Boot Order Tables. [Enabled] - Devices removed have positions in Boot Order Tables retained for later reinsertion.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( BootMode _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: StaticBootSnapshot
knob.description: [Yes] Take snapshot of current boot order to save as Static Boot Order Template.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( BootMode _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( StaticBootPolicy _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced Boot Options/Reset Static Boot Order
